about.title: Game: Colors
about.descr: Benefit: Develops cognitive flexibility, ability to make quick decisions, suppress automatic reactions (Stroop effect).
about.rule1: 1. Look at the word ‚Äî it's written in different colors! Click on the card that matches the color of the text, not its value. üé®
about.rule2: 2. Make 15 correct answers in a row to win! üèÜ

about.title: Game: Numbers
about.descr: Benefit: Improves visual perception, trains the ability to focus on the desired object among many distracting elements.
about.rule1: 1. You need to find and click on the card with the number that matches the number under the cards. üòä
about.rule2: 2. Make 15 correct answers in a row to win! üèÜ

about.title: Game: Math Sprint
about.descr: Benefit: Develops speed of information processing, improves arithmetic skills, and helps train the brain for quick calculations.
about.rule1: 1. You need to find and click on the card with the correct answer. üòä
about.rule2: 2. Make 15 correct answers in a row to win! üèÜ

about.title: Game: Tongue Twisters
about.descr: Benefit: Improves diction, develops speech apparatus, trains memory and concentration.
about.rule1: 1. Press the microphone button and say the tongue twister shown on the screen. üé§
about.rule2: 2. You have 10 seconds to correctly pronounce the tongue twister. ‚è≥
about.rule3: 3. You get a point for each correctly pronounced tongue twister. If you make a mistake, the score resets! üèÜ
